resources.string: Tells you when your monster has encounted an event.
A memory game where you must select buttons in the same pattern presented. Earn steps for each round you pass.
This entry hasn\'t been unlocked yet.
A seemingly basic egg. Contains a balanced monster.
A prehistoric egg. Contains an ancient type monster.
An aquatic egg. Contains an aquatic type monster.
An enigma type monster. It can\'t move its main body so it waits and gazes at the passing world.
A fire type monster. Enjoys sitting around campfires and eating stray embers.
A dino type monster. Once it bites onto something it never lets go so watch out!
A dino type monster. It sleeps for 20 hours a day and only wakes up to eat or when bothered.
A dino type monster. A dangerous savage who will attack anything that enters its territory.
